thoughts.text: I need to find the URLs of the websites for the hiking trails I am interested in. I can use the 'google' command to search for the names of the trails and find their websites.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the 'google' command will allow me to quickly search for the names of the hiking trails I am interested in and find their websites. This will save me time compared to manually searching for each website.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'google' command to search for the names of the hiking trails
- Look for the websites of the hiking trails in the search results
- Take note of the URLs of the websites for each hiking trail
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am finding the correct websites for each hiking trail, as there may be multiple trails with similar names or different variations of the same name.
thoughts.speak: I will use the 'google' command to search for the names of the hiking trails I am interested in and find their websites.
